statement: Giant leap !! easier step, next. Product now has startDate and endDate to specify when it is active. endData null tells the product is active for ever from the startDate. The startDate and endDate are inclusive. 'POST' the count of products which are active today
instructions: You can 'GET' the input from http://host:port/challenge/input and output should be 'POST' json to http://host:port/challenge/output. Importan note: The time between request 'GET' input and 'POST' request should not exceed 2 secs
